(:action lay ; Relax or position oneself in a comfortable state
    :parameters (?entity - person ?surface - object)
    :precondition (and (stuck ?entity ?surface) (buoyant ?entity))
    :effect (and (floating ?entity) (not (stuck ?entity ?surface))

(:action use
  ; Use a resource to achieve a goal and update the entity's state
  :parameters (?p - person ?resource - object ?context - context)
  :precondition (and 
    (available ?p)
    (has ?p ?resource)
    (in-context ?p ?context)
  )
  :effect (and 
    (goal-achieved ?p ?context)
    (not (in-context ?p ?context))

(:action identify ; Identify a characteristic of an entity and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - object ?feature - feature)
  :precondition (and (unobserved ?entity) (canIdentify ?feature ?entity))
  :effect (and (observed ?entity) (identified ?feature ?entity))

(:action plan ; Plan a task and update its status
    :parameters (?entity - object ?target - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?entity) (not (planned ?entity ?target)))
    :effect (and (planned ?entity ?target) (not (available ?entity))
